snippet.title: Sound Shapes™Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Watch the new launch trailer for Sound Shapes, now available for the PS3 and PS Vita systems!

Equal parts instrument and game, Sound Shapes™ gives everyone the ability to make music. Play through a unique campaign that fuses music and artwork into a classic 2D platformer. Create your own unique musical levels with all of the campaign content and share with the world. Sound Shapes creates an ever-changing musical community for everyone to enjoy at home on their PS3, or on the go with their PS Vita.

http://us.playstation.com/psvita/games-and-media/psv-sound-shapes.html (Vita)
http://us.playstation.com/games-and-media/games/sound-shapes-ps3.html (PS3)

©2012 Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. Sound Shapes is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC.
